SEARCH
Package org.project

Class ExponentialFunctionApp

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
org.project.ExponentialFunctionApp
public class ExponentialFunctionApp extends javafx.application.Application
ExponentialFunctionApp is a JavaFX application that calculates the exponential function a * b^x. It accepts inputs for a, b, and x in various formats and provides a GUI for interaction.

      public static double calculateExponentialFunction(double a, double b, double x) throws ArithmeticException
      Calculates the exponential function a * b^x.
      Parameters:
      a - the multiplier (real constant).
      b - the base (real constant).
      x - the exponent (real variable).
      Returns:
      the calculated value of a * b^x.
      Throws:
      ArithmeticException - if the calculation cannot be performed.
